mapper.select:
SELECT ZJID, GDMC, GDBMC, SJCLM, SJCL_SJLX, SJCL_GS, GDZQ, GDZQ_DW, YCSJ, ZXSJ, SYBZ, BZ, ZHZXSJ, JLCJSJ, JLCJYH, JLGXSJ, JLGXYH FROM TB_GDPZ WHERE 1 = 1
AND GDMC like '%' || #{gdmc} || '%'
AND upper(GDBMC) like '%' || upper(#{gdbmc}) || '%'
AND upper(SJCLM) like '%' || upper(#{sjclm}) || '%'
ORDER BY JLCJSJ
SELECT ZJID, GDMC, GDBMC, SJCLM, SJCL_SJLX, SJCL_GS, GDZQ, GDZQ_DW, YCSJ, ZXSJ, SYBZ, BZ, ZHZXSJ, JLCJSJ, JLCJYH, JLGXSJ, JLGXYH FROM TB_GDPZ WHERE ZJID=#{id}
